workshop.title: Enterprise Resource Planning: Self-Guided Hands-On Workshop
workshop.description: This workshop will show you how to use Oracle Enterprise Resource Planning in the Oracle Public Cloud.

labs.title: Read Me First
labs.description: This workshop will show you how to use Oracle Enterprise Resource Planning in the Oracle Public Cloud.

labs.title: Lab 1: Provisioning an Autonomous Data Warehouse Cloud Instance
labs.description: Learn how to provision a new ADW database

labs.title: Lab 2: Provisioning an Oracle Analytics Cloud Instance
labs.description: Learn how to provision a new OAC instance

labs.title: Lab 3: Connections from Oracle Analytics Cloud
labs.description: Learn how to connect Oracle Analytics Cloud to ERP and ADWC

labs.title: Lab 4: Visualizations on Oracle Analytics Cloud
labs.description: Learn how to create visualizations on Oracle Analytics Cloud
